Value Pack Includes 12 rolls with 150 2-ply sheets per roll; 1,800 total sheets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the bundle pack!
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics 2-Ply Paper Towels have become a household essential for their practicality and efficiency. With 150 flex-sheets per roll and a total of 12 rolls conveniently packaged in 2 packs of 6, this set ensures we're well-prepared for any mess or spill. The white, 2-ply construction provides absorbency and durability, making these paper towels suitable for a variety of tasks. The flexibility of the sheets allows for easy tearing, minimizing waste. Whether it's cleaning up spills, wiping surfaces, or tackling everyday messes, these paper towels from Amazon Basics are a reliable and cost-effective choice for maintaining a clean and organized home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect low cost paper towels!
reviews.reviewText: I am delighted with the 2-ply paper towels! Their superior thickness provides excellent absorbency, making cleanups a breeze. The durability is impressive, allowing me to tackle spills and messes with confidence. The soft texture is a bonus, ensuring a gentle touch on surfaces. The perforations make tearing off sheets effortless, promoting convenience in everyday use. These paper towels strike the perfect balance between strength and comfort, making them a staple in my household. I appreciate the quality they bring to my cleaning routine, and their efficiency has made them an indispensable part of my daily life. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not exceptional by any means but good value for money
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Cost-Effective: These paper towels provide a good bang for your buck. If you're on a budget, they certainly offer a reliable solution without breaking the bank.Decent Absorbency: For everyday spills and messes, they handle the situation reasonably well. You might need an extra sheet or two for bigger messes, but for general tasks, they suffice.Quantity: The pack comes with a good number of rolls, ensuring you won't run out quickly.Cons:Not Premium Quality: While they're good for the price, don’t expect luxury-level softness or the strength of premium brands.Occasional Lint: They can sometimes leave a bit of residue behind, especially on glass or shiny surfaces.In summary, while the Amazon Basics 2-Ply Paper Towels might not be exceptional, they certainly get the job done for general household tasks. If you’re looking for a basic, budget-friendly option, these are worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Frills, All Thrills: These Paper Towels Got You Covered!
reviews.reviewText: Listen, I'm not one to spend a fortune on paper towels. I mean, they're for wiping up spills, not winning awards, right? But these Amazon Basics 2-Ply Flex-Sheets? They seriously impressed me. First off, the quality is top-notch. They're just as thick and absorbent as the name brands, without the fancy packaging or eye-watering price tag. Spills disappear in a flash, even the sticky, crusty ones that make you question life choices. Plus, they tear off clean thanks to the Flex-Sheets thing, so no more raggedy edges hanging around. But here's the real kicker: these paper towels don't just get the job done, they make it kinda fun. Like, I don't know how they do it, but wiping down the counters feels strangely satisfying with these guys. Maybe it's the subtle crinkle, or the way they hold up to even the messiest cleaning tasks without turning into mush. Whatever it is, I'm sold. So, if you're looking for high-quality paper towels that won't break the bank, do yourself a favor and grab these Amazon Basics Flex-Sheets. They're all the thrills, none of the frills, and that's exactly what I need from a roll of paper. Five stars, easy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheaper isn't always better
reviews.reviewText: I normally order presto brand but with Black Friday these were on sale for $6 cheaper so rubbing pennies together I decided to order these instead. Worst decision I ever made. Yes, they are paper towels but not sure where some are getting this softness from cause these are definitely not soft in any way shape or form. These are almost like rough tissue paper. You try to rip one off the roll and you only get a half ripped piece since these are so thin. Not durable at all. I'm seriously considering just ordering my presto and just store these for backup. What a waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 🌟🧹 "Spill Slayer: Top-Tier Cleaning without the Price Tag!" 🧹🌟
reviews.reviewText: TLDR: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 Budget-friendly, high-quality clean-up crew in a roll! 🧻✨Okay, let's get real about paper towels. They're not exactly the rockstars of the shopping list, right? But these Amazon Basics 2-Ply Flex-Sheets? They're like the unsung heroes of my kitchen (and honestly, my life). 🦸‍♂️🍳Quality-wise, we're talking top-tier stuff. They're giving those big-name brands a run for their money, minus the flashy packaging and price tag that makes your wallet weep. 🏷️💸 Spills? What spills? These towels laugh in the face of messes - the sticky, stubborn kind that make you wonder why you even bother cooking.But wait, there's more! These aren't just your average, run-of-the-mill paper towels. Oh no, they bring a bit of joy to the mundane. Wiping counters suddenly turns into a satisfying task - it's like a mini workout for your cleaning muscles, with a gratifying crinkle sound as a bonus. And the Flex-Sheets? Pure genius. No more sad, torn edges making your roll look like a hot mess. 🎉Long story short: if you're all about getting the bang for your buck without skimping on quality, these are your go-to. Amazon Basics Flex-Sheets, you've earned a fan. Five stars for making clean-up less of a chore and more of a cheer! 🌈🧻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality towels
reviews.reviewText: They rolls were packed well and received in perfect condition. Like the towels being divided into smaller towels when dispensing. Absorbency and quality of towels, good price, and prompt service. Will purchase again when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They're great for if you're in a pinch...
reviews.reviewText: Thankful I can get paper towels on a sub and save through on Amazon but tbh, I'm not too big of a fan of these. While they're decent as paper towels, they're not as thick. They're decent at absorbing but the texture of itself is what I don't like. I feel like it's too rough and not fluffy enough. But if you're into the more rough than fluffy then I'd definitely give these a try.
